name.ja: <ruby>明<rt>めい</rt></ruby><ruby>鏡<rt>きょう</rt></ruby><ruby>止<rt>し</rt></ruby><ruby>水<rt>すい</rt></ruby>・<ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>孫<rt>そん</rt></ruby><ruby>降<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When a monster on your field is destroyed by an opponent's card effect.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you have a High Dragon Type monster in your Graveyard, the monster Special Summoned by this effect gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.
